DOC.brief_title: Outcome Analysis Minimally Invasive Spine Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: STUDY RATIONALE AND PRIMARY OBJECTIVE/HYPOTHESIS To assess clinical radiographic outcome spinal fusion procedure use Silicate-Substituted Calcium Phosphate ( Si-CaP ) , newer-generation synthetic ceramic design maximize osteoinduction osteoconduction . STUDY DESIGN Retrospective Study PURPOSE OF THE STUDY Providing compel evidence efficacy Si-CaP term result satisfactory fusion . SUMMARY OF METHODS A prospectively collect database review retrospectively , retrieve data 200 patient undergone different spinal fusion procedure use Silicate-Substituted Calcium Phosphate ( Si-CaP ) . An average follow duration least 12 month consider . Clinical outcome assess use visual analog scale ( VAS ) , Oswestry Disability Index ( ODI ) , Neck Disability Index ( NDI ) . Pre-operative score compare late follow-up score . A board certify Neuro-radiologist assess fusion rate . Fusion determine presence bony bridge 2 consecutive section least 2 plane compute tomographic imaging . SECONDARY ENDPOINTS AND EXPECTED RESULTS The purpose study evaluate level clinical radiographic improvement patient implant Silicate-Substituted Calcium Phosphate ( Si-CaP ) bone graft substitute material spinal fusion . More comprehensive long term study able provide compel evidence efficacy Si-CaP term result satisfactory fusion . They strongly support previously publish data imply Si-CaP utilized alternative autogenous bone graft spinal arthrodesis procedure .
DOC.criteria: Patients different spinal fusion procedure ( include AxiaLIF ( axial lumbar interbody fusion ) , TLIF ( transforaminal lumbar interbody fusion ) , ELIF ( extreme lateral interbody fusion ) , PCF ( posterior cervical fusion ) , ACDF ( anterior discectomy fusion ) ) use SilicateSubstituted Calcium Phosphate ( ActifuseÂ® , Baxter , Deerfield , IL ) bone graft substitute . Utilization bone extenders addition SiCaP bone graft substitute .
